title: Merry, From O'er the Brandywine (1C303)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Shire
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Companion • Hobbit
Strength:	3
Vitality:	4
Resistance:	6
Signet:	Aragorn
Game Text:	While Merry bears a weapon, he is strength +2.
Lore:	”'I don't know why he's so upset, it's only a few carrots … my point is, he's overreacting.'”
Rarity:	C
